name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @RonaldSimmonsUS Because I cut off the red header, specific unit and issuing date.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 17, Inner Mongolia. Jinglanmuhe Water Saving Company owed workers wages, and the workers knelt down to demand their wages.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 17, Dongguan, Guangdong. In the cultural and art district, a construction project department owed workers wages, and workers held up banners to demand wages and defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Netizens added

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 15, eight female workers in Ye County, Pingdingshan, Henan, suffocated to death while returning home in a refrigerated truck. It is reported that this was not the first time for these eight people to return home in a refrigerated truck.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to a report on June 17, the State Council executive meeting held recently emphasized and proposed: Eliminate the tendency of some departments and cadres to be "afraid of housing" and to be hesitant in doing things, and to hesitate when it comes to work related to real estate reform and innovation, and to avoid it if possible and not do it if possible.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 18, the South District of Zhonghuan International City in Xi'an, Shaanxi Province, has been unfinished for ten years. Owners defended their rights in front of the Shaanxi Provincial Government and the Xi'an Petition Center. Some owners were dragged away

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 18, Dalian, Liaoning: A bus crashed into a bank in Jinpu District, injuring five people.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the morning of June 18, an explosion occurred in a residential building in Fuyang Town, Chaozhou, Guangdong, causing serious damage to the second-floor wall of the house. It was reported that the explosion was caused by a leak in a gas cylinder in the kitchen on the second floor. The accident injured two people, who have been sent to the hospital and are not in danger of death.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Video 4 Subtitles

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 18, Nanchong, Sichuan. The Feicuicheng Zijinfu real estate project was left unfinished, and the owners gathered on the roof and jumped off the building to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 18, the U.S. Embassy in China issued a statement urging the Chinese government to immediately release Huang Xueqin, Wang Jianbing and other individuals who have been unjustly detained for exercising their fundamental freedoms, and called on the Chinese government to fulfill its international commitments and respect all human rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Homeowners of Jiawang Garden in Huidong County, Huizhou City, held up banners to protest against the delay in the delivery of their properties due to breach of contract

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 18, netizens found out that the "diplomatic immunity sister" was Yu Qi, Secretary General of the Asia-Pacific Space Cooperation Organization.
Another netizen went to the headquarters of the Asia-Pacific Space Cooperation Organization and found the car in the video.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: @LordBlacky0619 Wrong vehicle

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 16, after the Beihai Municipal People's Government in Guangxi announced that it would no longer retain the Municipal Administrative Comprehensive Law Enforcement Bureau, some netizens took photos of urban management still enforcing the law on the street.
On the 17th, the Beihai government told reporters: Urban management has not been abolished, but its functions have been delegated to various districts in the city.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 17, in Tangshan, Hebei, a woman reported China Mobile's Linxi Business Office in Guye District, Tangshan City, using her personal information to apply for broadband for others without her knowledge. Not only that, during the complaint, the mobile company approached the brigade secretary of her village to ask for a private solution, and even approached the leader of her husband's unit to mediate the matter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It is reported that Ecuador will cancel the visa exemption for Chinese citizens from July 1.
The Ministry of Foreign Affairs responded that it is cooperating with relevant countries to combat cross-border smuggling activities.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 18, a school in Zhengzhou required every junior high school student to prepare a textbook on Xi Jinping's Socialism with Chinese Characteristics for a New Era before the high school entrance exam. It was said that this was a requirement from the Education Bureau.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A bookstore in Guangdong

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 17, it was reported online that a Zeekr employee was fired for anonymously posting a complaint about the Zhijia team on an internal forum. The article pointed out that the Zhijia team fooled the leadership and had multiple safety issues.
The anonymous person said that he just said a few truthful words on behalf of the car owner, and was fired internally afterwards without any compensation.
In response, Zeekr said that the online content was false information, and the company terminated the labor contract for the violation of the employee's screenshot and outbound posting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 14, an open letter from the Jiexiu Water Supply Company in Shanxi stated that due to the continued high temperature, with the government's approval, we have temporarily taken measures to suspend water use for bathing, swimming, car washing and other business operations.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Official reports say five people were killed and 15 are missing in heavy rain in Meizhou, Guangdong.
But local residents on social media questioned the official number of people reported.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 3-June 17, Zhuhai, Guangdong. Villagers in Gaishan Village reported that village cadres privately sold the village's collective land and forcibly transferred arable land, which caused dissatisfaction among villagers and led to protests to protect their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 15, Nanjing Pukou District planned to build a garbage station near Xijiang Ruifu Community in Jiangpu Street, which was opposed by nearby residents. 
Currently, many residents have been arrested for offline rights protection or expressing their intention to protect their rights online.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 17, Nanyang, Henan. Yunda Express owed workers wages, and workers went on strike. Some workers sat on the conveyor belt to defend their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 17, Beijing. Northern Continent Zhengshengkang's capital market was hit by a thunderstorm, and cash withdrawals could not be made. Victims came from all over the country to defend their rights at the Beijing Norland headquarters. One victim said that three people had committed suicide as a result.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 17, Hengyang, Hunan. The deputy secretary of a village party committee in Shouyue Township was murdered in nearby Hengshan County.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: According to netizens, it is suspected that the village cadre cheated on her and maintained an improper relationship with the other person, and was killed by the other person's husband. The murderer was not arrested, but surrendered himself.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
At present, many places across the country have established "Police-Tax Synthetic Operations Centers".
According to news searches, the "Police-Tax Synthetic Operations Center" can be traced back to Shenzhen in 2020. Such centers integrate operations, party and league building, propaganda and education, and intelligence exchange, and use big data analysis, AI modeling and other information technologies to analyze cases, investigate cases, and analyze characteristics, effectively improving the level of departments in investigating and handling tax violations.
